num_chromosomes.title: Num_chromosomes
num_chromosomes.description: Total number of chromosomes in the genome assembly.

organism_name.title: Organism_name
organism_name.description: Name of the expected organism. This is determined prior to sequencing.

strain_name.title: Strain_name
strain_name.description: Strain name of the organism of interest.

ncbi_taxonomy_id.title: Ncbi_taxonomy_id
ncbi_taxonomy_id.description: NCBI taxonomy identifier of the organism.

sample_type.title: Sample_type
sample_type.description: Type of sample used for the BioSample submission, if applicable.

host.title: Host
host.description: The natural host to the organism from which the sample was obtained.

number_of_Ns_or_Xs.title: Number_of_ns_or_xs
number_of_Ns_or_Xs.description: Total number of Ns or Xs in the assembled genome.

isolation_provider_name.title: Isolation_provider_name
isolation_provider_name.description: Name of the provider from which the biological sample was derived.

contact_name.title: Contact_name
contact_name.description: Contact name associated with the BioSample.

sequencing_method.title: Sequencing_method
sequencing_method.description: Sequencing method used to obtain the DNA fragments/sequences.

n50.title: N50
n50.description: Length of the shortest read to minimally represent 50% of the assembly.

l50.title: L50
l50.description: Number of reads that minimally represent 50% of the assembly.

length.title: Length
length.description: Total length of the assembled genome.

avg_nuc_identitiy.title: Avg_nuc_identitiy
avg_nuc_identitiy.description: Average nucleotide identity between the assembly and the reference sequences.

%assembly_with_>20x_coverage.title: %assembly_with_>20x_coverage
%assembly_with_>20x_coverage.description: Summary statistics of percent assembly with 20x coverage, other summery statistics could also be used.

query_coverage_against_reference.title: Query_coverage_against_reference
query_coverage_against_reference.description: BLAST query coverage of the entire assembly between the assembly and reference sequences.

percent_identity_against_reference.title: Percent_identity_against_reference
percent_identity_against_reference.description: BLAST percent identity of the entire assembly between the assembly and reference sequences.

seq_id.title: Seq_id
seq_id.description: Reference identifier to a specific sequence inside the assembled genome.

n95.title: N95
n95.description: Length of the shortest read to minimally represent 95% of the assembly.

l95.title: L95
l95.description: Number of reads that minimally represent 95% of the assembly.

cnt_scaffolds.title: Cnt_scaffolds
cnt_scaffolds.description: Number of scaffolds to represent the assembled genome.

cnt_contigs.title: Cnt_contigs
cnt_contigs.description: Number of contigs to represent the assembled genome.

contigs_momentum.title: Contigs_momentum
contigs_momentum.description: Cumulative normalized momentum (contig_size*count) of all contigs.

reads_unaligned.title: Reads_unaligned
reads_unaligned.description: Number of reads in short_read pool that do not align to assembly.

aligned_momentum.title: Aligned_momentum
aligned_momentum.description: Cumulative normalized momentum (aligned_size*count) of own reads aligned to assembly.

overhang_momentum.title: Overhang_momentum
overhang_momentum.description: Cumulative normalized momentum (unaligned_size*count) of own reads unaligned to assembly.

bases_percentile_aligned.title: Bases_percentile_aligned
bases_percentile_aligned.description: Percentile of bases on partially aligned reads with relation to count of all bases on aligned reads.

cnt_gaps.title: Cnt_gaps
cnt_gaps.description: Number of gaps in an assembly as covered by own reads.

size_gaps.title: Size_gaps
size_gaps.description: Cumulative size of gaps as covered by own reads.

clonal_populations.title: Clonal_populations
clonal_populations.description: Number of clonal populations on assembly nephosome.

clonal_expanse.title: Clonal_expanse
clonal_expanse.description: Total size of all clonal contigs.

phred_average.title: Phred_average
phred_average.description: Average phred score of aligned base call.

count_major_variations.title: Count_major_variations
count_major_variations.description: Number of +50% variations on a variation profile of own reads on avartion profile of own reads on assembly.

indels_momentum.title: Indels_momentum
indels_momentum.description: Momentum of indels (count*percentile) on variation profile of own reads alignment to assembly.

mutation_momentum.title: Mutation_momentum
mutation_momentum.description: Momentum of mutations (count*percentile) on variation profile of own reads  alignment to assembly.

alignment_disbalance.title: Alignment_disbalance
alignment_disbalance.description: Ratio of forward and reverse own reads aligned on assembly.

alignment_anisotropy.title: Alignment_anisotropy
alignment_anisotropy.description: Anisotropy of basecalls with relation to own reads aligned to assembly.

rpkm.title: Rpkm
rpkm.description: Reads per kilobase of reference size per million alignments.

fpkm.title: Fpkm
fpkm.description: Fragments per kilobase of reference size per million alignments.

coverage_homogeneity.title: Coverage_homogeneity
coverage_homogeneity.description: Anisotropy of the coverage with relation to assembly frame.

ambiguous_bases.title: Ambiguous_bases
ambiguous_bases.description: Number of IUPAC ambiguous bases in reads(Ns, Ys, etc.)

taxid_composition.title: Taxid_composition
taxid_composition.description: Taxonomic identifiers hit by the reads.

seq_composition.title: Seq_composition
seq_composition.description: Sequence identifiers hit by the reads.

assembly_type.title: Assembly_type
assembly_type.description: haploid, haploid-with-alt-loci (a haploid assembly with alternative loci, for example as provided by the Genome Reference Consortium for the human genome), diploid, unresolved diploid, or alternate pseudohaplotype. See the NCBI Assembly Data Model for a definition of these terms.

assembly_level.title: Assembly_level
assembly_level.description: The highest level of assembly for any object in the assembly.
